description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

1.0.description:
# Battle Zone Challenge 1.0 Release
## ROM Info
- All conveniences from base Platinum, including 60FPS patch, AP PDA in items and on R Button, and AP Items Room are present.
- Biking is possible in far more locations.
- The player will start with the National Pokédex, Running Shoes, p30,000, and 10 Premier Balls.
## APWorld Info
- There is presently only one option, that being Dowsing Machine logic. There are 184 locations in the APWorld.


Check the [README](https://github.com/Linneus/Platinum-Battle-Zone-Challenge/blob/main/README.md) for patching and randomizing instructions.
Make sure to have [the latest APWorld for manual](https://github.com/ManualForArchipelago/Manual/releases) and the latest [Universal Tracker](https://github.com/FarisTheAncient/Archipelago/releases/)! Note this is the first release on Archipelago 0.6.2.

**For those who are new to the Platinum AP Manual project**, you only need to download the .zip file. It contains the patch files, the APWorld, the YAML, the xDelta patching program, and the version of Universal Pokémon Randomizer ZX that this project uses.

**If you are a returning player** and you have all of those files from the Platinum AP Manual, all you need are the APWorld and your preferred Patch. You will also need the Battle Zone Settings file for Universal Pokémon Randomizer as is mentioned in the README.

## This Release Has Been Updated!
If you downloaded BZC.Manual.1.0.zip prior to August 2nd, it includes outdated patches! You will have to redownload them and patch your game again.

1.0.2.description:
# Battle Zone Challenge 1.0.2 Release
## ROM Changes
- The trigger in front the slopes on Route 228 have been fixed to correctly check for whether or not a Pokémon in your party knows the move Fly. It had previously only checked for whether or not the Pokémon in Slot 2 of your party had the move.
- Added a new secret.
## APWorld Changes
- Although the APWorld is included in this release, there have been no changes made. This APWorld is identical to the one found in 1.0 and 1.0.1.


Check the [README](https://github.com/Linneus/Platinum-Battle-Zone-Challenge/blob/main/README.md) for patching and randomizing instructions.
Make sure to have [the latest APWorld for manual](https://github.com/ManualForArchipelago/Manual/releases) and the latest [Universal Tracker](https://github.com/FarisTheAncient/Archipelago/releases/)!

**For those who are new to the Platinum AP Manual project**, you only need to download the .zip file. It contains the patch files, the APWorld, the YAML, the xDelta patching program, and the version of Universal Pokémon Randomizer ZX that this project uses.

**If you are a returning player** and you have files from a previous release, all you need are the APWorld and your preferred Patch. You may also need the Battle Zone Settings file for Universal Pokémon Randomizer as mentioned in the README.

1.0.3.description:
# Battle Zone Challenge 1.0.3 Release
## ROM Changes
- Made changes to the Battle Factory. Originally all pictures shown by the Factory Aides would display male Pokémon sprites, breaking on every Female-only Pokémon. The script will now check whether it has one of the Female-only Pokémon and attempt to display a female sprite. As always, save before entering the Factory, and if you run into a female-only Pokémon (cross-reference with [this list](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Gender#Single-gender_Pok%C3%A9mon)) or if this crash still occurs, please report it. Bear in mind that this crash will _not_ happen on DeSmuME.
- Added one new sprite for the previously added secret.
## APWorld Changes
- Although the APWorld is included in this release, there have been no changes made. This APWorld is identical to the one found in previous versions.


Check the [README](https://github.com/Linneus/Platinum-Battle-Zone-Challenge/blob/main/README.md) for patching and randomizing instructions.
Make sure to have [the latest APWorld for manual](https://github.com/ManualForArchipelago/Manual/releases) and the latest [Universal Tracker](https://github.com/FarisTheAncient/Archipelago/releases/)!

**For those who are new to the Platinum AP Manual project**, you only need to download the .zip file. It contains the patch files, the APWorld, the YAML, the xDelta patching program, and the version of Universal Pokémon Randomizer ZX that this project uses.

**If you are a returning player** and you have files from a previous release, all you need are the APWorld and your preferred Patch. You may also need the Battle Zone Settings file for Universal Pokémon Randomizer as mentioned in the README.

1.0.4.description:
# Battle Zone Challenge 1.0.4 Release
## ROM Changes
- Fixed all instances of board text boxes crashing the game. (The ranking computers in the five battle facilities and the elevator in the Ribbon Syndicate.)
- Scripting for lost battles in the Battle Arcade has been adjusted, hopefully preventing crashes.
- Added final sprite for the previously added secret.
  - With this, the secret is complete, and will be officially added to the APWorld when the first player finds it.
## APWorld Changes
- The Amulet Coin is now Useful.
- PP Ups are now Filler.
  - The PP Max remains Useful.


Check the [README](https://github.com/Linneus/Platinum-Battle-Zone-Challenge/blob/main/README.md) for patching and randomizing instructions.
Make sure to have [the latest APWorld for manual](https://github.com/ManualForArchipelago/Manual/releases) and the latest [Universal Tracker](https://github.com/FarisTheAncient/Archipelago/releases/)!

**For those who are new to the Platinum AP Manual project**, you only need to download the .zip file. It contains the patch files, the APWorld, the YAML, the xDelta patching program, and the version of Universal Pokémon Randomizer ZX that this project uses.

**If you are a returning player** and you have files from a previous release, all you need are the APWorld and your preferred Patch. You may also need the Battle Zone Settings file for Universal Pokémon Randomizer as mentioned in the README.
